name: Honimal 30 - Rise of the Fusian War
name_original: Honimal 30 - Rise of the Fusian War
description:
“Honimal - Rise of the Fusian” is a 3D-action-game, developed by an international team of students, available in German, English, French, Chinese and Vietnamese.

The game is the first introduction into the vast world of “Honimal”. It was created at the Bauhaus University Weimar in the course 8-Bit of Bauhaus II during the winter semester 2019/2020.

Story

You are the tiger-warrior Chien Ho, also called “30”, and have to fight against an army of colonial ant soldiers, a tank-rhino and a crazy hippo with a harpoon launcher in the big Arena of Arachnid to win your and your people’s freedom.

Features
  • Rich story
  • Rich 3D audio: We recommend using headphones for the full experience.
  • Close-combat and bow fighting system
  • Available languages: English, German, French, Chinese (Simplified) and Vietnamese
  • Interactive tutorials
  • Rich volumetric and indirect lighting
  • Planned: Support for hardware-accelerated realtime raytracing
PC Specifications Minimum PC Specifications
  • OS: Windows 10 (Version 1809)
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i7-4770K / AMD Ryzen 5 1500X
  • Memory: 8GB
  • Graphics Card: Nvidia GeForce GTX 1060 6GB / AMD Radeon RX 480 4GB (Or any device supporting DirectX 11 or DirectX 12 and Shader Model 5.0)
Recommended PC Specifications
  • OS: Windows 10 (Version 1909)
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i7-9750H
  • Memory: 12GB
  • Graphics Card: Nvidia GeForce RTX 2060 6GB

Display resolution and graphics quality can be adjusted in the game's settings menu. We recommend activating the FPS counter to measure the game's performence on your device.
